root.name: Track & Field II
root.description: Overview Track Field II is a sequel to Track Field for the NES. Even though it has the II numeral it is actually the fourth game in the series. The game is known in Japan as "Konami Sports In Seoul" and as the title indicates it takes place during the 1988 Summer Olympics in Seoul, South Korea. Sporting Events High Dive Archery Clay Pigeon Shooting ArcheryHurdlesHorizontal BarFencingFreestyle Swimming Taekwondo Triple Jump Taekwondo Hammer ThrowPole VaultHang GlidingArm Wrestling (only available in Versus Mode) Canoeing Canoeing

similar_games.game: Beijing 2008: The Official Video Game of the Olympic Games
